42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying :If any believing man calls another believing man an unbeliever, if he is actually an infidel, it is all right ; if not, he will become an infidel

chapter.ara-name: باب الدَّلِيلِ عَلَى زِيَادَةِ الإِيمَانِ وَنُقْصَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Proof Of Increase And Decrease Of Faith
